module.name: physical_unit_2d_design_view
module.keywords: module, component shape, component location, two dimensional, electrical, electronic, design

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information that describes the two dimensional shape of a component and that describes the two dimensional location of a component where the product context is a physical design view.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Assembly module with interconnect component, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1643;
items within the scope of application module Layered 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1693;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit design view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1728.
